name: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls!
description:
Welcome to Sandbox City! Now with AI Traffic

🌇 Run free and drive around in a lively city full of pedestrians, zombies, and traffic in first or third person.

🥊 Punch the zombies and 🚘 Run them over to save the population of Sandbox City!

🚗 "Borrow" one of the many AI cars, such as taxis 🚕 police cars 🚓 ambulances 🚑 vans 🚚 and more!

⚙️ Customize the game's settings to your heart's content! There are a TON of graphics settings you can change, with existing presets from Very Low to Ultra and individual settings you can set to suit your device and preference. Anything from Shadows and View Distance to Anti-Aliasing and Post Effects are adjustable on the fly!

Controls

- WASD for movement.

- Hold Shift to run.

- Space to jump when on foot, to handbrake when in car.

- E to enter/exit cars, pick-up/drop items.

- T to enter and exit Slo-Mo.

- C to change camera perspective.

- Esc to Quit.
